name: Govardhana Miriyala Kannaiah
tagline: Founder of NeuVeu, author of 'Kubernetes Anti-Patterns', and Technical Author at ByteByteGo
bio: Govardhana Miriyala Kannaiah is the founder of NeuVeu consulting and author of 'Kubernetes Anti-Patterns' (Packt Publishing). With 17+ years of IT experience and 125K+ LinkedIn followers, he's a recognized voice in DevOps, multi-cloud architecture, and Kubernetes best practices.
